items.title: Venezuela live updates: Russia, Iran issue new statements in support of Venezuela
items.description: The president of Venezuela was taken by American forces and transported to the U.S. Saturday to face federal drug charges.

items.title: WATCH:  Drone team who saved escaped adopted senior dog speaks with David Muir about rescue
items.description: David Muir shares the story of the newly-adopted senior dog that ran away while traveling to her forever home – and the drone team that helped locate ...

items.title: WATCH:  Massive fire tears through 4 buildings in New York City
items.description: The 5-alarm fire left both firefighters and a resident injured – including two firefighters with serious injuries.

items.title: Protest-hit Iran warily watches the US after its raid on Venezuela
items.description: As Iran is gripped by new protests, many people there are focused on the U.S. raid in Venezuela and wonder whether the same could occur in Tehran

items.title: 'Trial by ambush,' Uvalde officer's defense alleges after witness testimony changes
items.description: The former school officer is being tried on 29 counts of child endangerment.
